message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Alice, $180 is a bit too steep for me. I'm really interested in the product but I can only go up to $120. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I understand that $180 is a bit high for you, but I'm still looking to make a good profit on this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $160.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $160 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $130. If we can't find a middle ground, I'll have to consider other options.
Hi Bob, I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, and I appreciate your honesty. I'm willing to make another concession and sell it to you for $145.
Alice, I'm getting closer to your price, but $145 is still a little too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $135. Let's see if we can finalize this deal.
Hi Bob, I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we won't be able to reach an agreement. However, I'm willing to make one more concession and sell it to you for $140.
